thread.title: Wall Street crumbles in massive market route

title: Wall Street crumbles in massive market route
text:
Wall Street crumbles in massive market rout Tuesday, February 06, 2018 - 02:03 
Stocks plunged, with the Dow falling nearly 1,600 points at its lows as a long-awaited pullback from record highs deepened. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Stocks plunged, with the Dow falling nearly 1,600 points at its lows as a long-awaited pullback from record highs deepened. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2BFIc8A
